text: La. Ganesan (born 16 February 1945) is an Indian politician. He is the Governor of Nagaland since 20 February 2023. He is also served as the Governor of West Bengal, in an additional charge role, from 18 July 2022 to 17 November 2022 respectively and Governer of Manipur from 2021 till 2023.. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1945 births Category:Governors of Manipur Category:Governors of West Bengal Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: La. Ganesan
